name: Super Warrior Manga Creator Games Dragon Z Edition
name_original: Super Warrior Manga Creator Games Dragon Z Edition
description:
Rumor has it in Rainy city that the annual cute Chibi DBZ contest will be next week. You quickly check on the Internet only to see that this is indeed true. You have only seven days to match up against the city’s most fashionable Chibi DBZ!!!

Chibi DBZ Dress Up puts you in a situation where you can show your cute fashion and dress up your own unique and unbelievably cute Chibi DBZ. Only in this way you can achieve a version that is fitting for a winner in the city’s best Chibi DBZ contest.

Get your groove on and put that fashion taste and creativity into good use. Create the cutest little Chibi DBZ with the most outstanding and fashionable clothes and accessories.

------ How to Play ------


Chibi DBZ Dress up has a simple and fun gameplay. You can dress up your Chibi DBZ by customizing every piece of clothing and accessory. The game is rich on customization so you can achieve whatever fashion ideas you have in mind.

You can customise your Chibi DBZ hair, head accessory, dress, necklace and environment.

The game is free to play. You can however pay a small fee to have specific Chibi DBZ models , as well as high class accessories or pieces of clothing unlocked.

What are you waiting for? Download Now!!
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Please rate this game and let us know what you think ! Your feedback is very important for me.
